resources.string: Content : To create contrast between UI elements, such as distinguishing a top app bar from a system bar, you can use light or dark variants of your primary color on each elements. You can also use variants to distinguish elements within a component, such different variants used on a floating action button container, and the icon within it.To create contrast between UI elements, such as distinguishing a top app bar from a system bar, you can use light or dark variants of your primary color on each elements.
